summary: add a book in the riverwood trader who obtain all cheats and codes and secrets to level up
descriptionHtml:
hello everyone im [COLOR=#8064a2][SIZE=5]skull19972[/SIZE][/COLOR]
 and this is my first mod 

Please endrose if you like !!!
If you would like to give any kind of feedback on this mod, please use the website\'s \'Comments, Endorsement and Ratings !!! and thankyou everyone :)

im a person who hates retextures verry verry much so all my mods is not a retex so don\'t worry
The book of Cheats

[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=6]DESCRIPTION :[/SIZE][/COLOR]its a simple mod who add a book in the riverwood trader you can see the pic you must use your sneak mod because the book is stolen so you must steal it from the table without lucan valerious know about it
you will find the book on the table the righ of the  one of lucan valerious its not hard to find
in the book you will find all the cheats and codes also many ways to improve your skills and lvl also when you read it your speech skill will be improved verry whell 
 i was using this book until i did find its a good idea  to shear it with the others its cool because it obtain all the secrets to level up and all the cheats too so here it is :)
and the book obtain 6 parts crated by 2 brothers the master of the mind and the master of the speech they was verry intellegent thief and their book did survive into ages of war and finaly the book of those two brothers did end up in the riverwood trader so can you ,steal lucan valerious \'s tresor ? also you can find the two brothers in sovengard they are just drinking and eating 
soon i will add some pic to the book and a little quest to have it just to be so awesome not else
THE BOOK OF CHEATS 
[COLOR=#8064a2][SIZE=5]ENJOY!!![/SIZE][/COLOR]!!!!! and im sorry of my bad english its not my natal language
your freind [COLOR=#8064a2][SIZE=5]skull19972[/SIZE][/COLOR]
